name: Ladies Restroom
description:
The main character mistakenly goes into the women's restroom instead of the men's, and witnesses scenes of mistresses abuse male slaves. Subsequently, he gets stuck in the toilet and also becomes a slave for the dominant ladies.

The game features:
- Good character dialogues and story line
- Freedom of movement in virtual reality
- Completing tasks in each episode
- Feeling like a toilet slave at the mercy of a mistresses
- Realistic characters and scenes of mistresses abusing slaves

Enjoy great VR experience of female domination !
